title: Beyond Spatial Explanations: Explainable Face Recognition in the Frequency Domain
details: M Huber, N Damer - arXiv preprint arXiv:2407.11941, 2024
abstract: The need for more transparent face recognition (FR), along with other visual-based decision-making systems has recently attracted more attention in research, society, and industry. The reasons why two face images are matched or not matched by a …
